definitions.definition: To attend to in order to guard and protect; to accompany as a safeguard (for the person escorted or for others); to give honorable or ceremonious attendance to
To accompany (a person) in order to compel them to go somewhere (e.g. to leave a building).
To go with someone as a partner , for example on a formal date .
To work as an escort (sex worker).

main_definition: To attend to in order to guard and protect; to accompany as a safeguard (for the person escorted or for others); to give honorable or ceremonious attendance to
secondary_definitions: To accompany (a person) in order to compel them to go somewhere (e.g. to leave a building).
To go with someone as a partner , for example on a formal date .
( intransitive ) To work as an escort (sex worker).
